description.narrative: ADB will provide a senior secured loan of up to $50 million (or CNY equivalent) with a 3-year tenor to CFPA Microfinance Management (CFPAMM) in the PRC. The proposed loan will fund CFPAMM's microfinance operations in counties designated by central and local government as poverty stricken areas.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
The number of active women borrowers increases to 692,900 (2015 baseline: 285,653)
The number of active borrowers increases to 745,000 (2015 baseline: 306,101)
Annual microloan disbursement increases to CNY14.0 billion (2015 baseline: CNY4.1 billion)
